snippet: Large crowds and a steady proliferation of lighter wines at a tasting last month indicate it is going to be a busy season on Long Island.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines columns highlights white and rose wines from Brooklyn Uncorked wine tasting at Skylight One Hanson (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Large crowds and a steady proliferation of lighter wines at a tasting last month indicate it is going to be a busy season on Long Island.

headline.print_headline: Summer Shades Of White and Rosé
headline.seo: Summer Colors of White and Rosé
headline.main: Summer Shades of White and Rosé
